appearance.desc_select: Here is the appearance of your character, this appearance contains the current changes you may have made. To go to the modification use the emoji: "%s"
appearance.desc_select_one:
Between brackets and in bold, means that this is the selected choice.
Use the arrows to change the appearance, the colored emoji to change the color (if available for this type), and use the other emoji to validate

appearance.list_of_possible_color: List of possible colors for the selected type
appearance.modifying_elsewhere: Modification in progress on another message...

tutorial.start:
Welcome to the FightRPG guided tutorial, if this language does not suit you, use the command "lang".
For your first step, use the command "info" to continue the tutorial.
tutorial.info_first: This command allows you to display all the informations about your character. The emojis that the bot adds (if it has the rights) allow you to hide or show some parts of the panel. Now it's time to display the area your character is in. Use the "area" command to continue the tutorial.
tutorial.area_first: This command allows you to display the informations of the area in which your character is. This area has a weather forecast that gives bonuses or penalties. What interests you the most is the list of monsters in the area, you can see the identifier on the left of the name of the monsters. This is the ID you have to use to be able to fight the monster. To continue the tutorial, use the command "fight" followed by a space and the ID number of the monster.
tutorial.fight_first: Congratulations, you are fighting your first monster! The fight is displayed in the following order: Name of the person doing something, then the result of his action. You can see at the bottom of the message your life, mana and energy points on the left and the opponent's on the right. You can also use the emoji to display the result of the fight directly. Some actions take a certain amount of time and you have to wait between these actions. The time you have to wait depends on the action. If you have won the fight, you may have gained a level, if so to continue the tutorial, use the command "attributes" otherwise fight again using the command "fight". At each fight, except the dungeons, your life points are reset to the maximum.
tutorial.attributes_first:
Here is the panel containing only your attributes, at the top of it you can see your points to distribute. To each main attribute corresponds a shortcut word that allows you to increase it if you have points available.
Here is a summary of the effects of the attributes: 
Strength (str) → Only used by skills.
Constitution (con) → Increases your hit points by 10 for each point invested, reduces waiting time after a fight, increases physical defense.
Dexterity (dex) → Increases physical critical chance. 
Charisma (cha) → Increases your chance to stun your opponent with a melee attack, reduces the wait time after an arena fight, increases magic critical evasion rate.
Will (will) → Makes you more resistant to stun blows, increases physical critical evasion rate. 
Chance (luck) → Increases your chance of finding items.
Wisdom (wis) → Increases the experience you gain from fighting, increases magic defense, increments your mana points by 2 for each point you invest.
Perception (per) → Increases your chance of not being attacked by a monster other than the one you want to fight, increases magic and physical critical evasion rate. 
Intelligence (int) → Increases magic critical rate, increases exp for crafting/gathering, increases chance of gathering.
As a beginner we advise you to start with a split between strength and constitution. Use the command "up <shortcut attribute> <number of points to distribute>". The list of shortcuts is located in the help panel, feel free to consult it (command "help"), you can also reset your points using the command "reset", however this costs gold. To distribute in strength and then in constitution, use: "up str 3" then "up con 2", only the main attributes can be increased in this way except for the armor. Once this is done, use the command "talents" to continue the tutorial.
tutorial.talents_first: This is the talent display. With the talents you can unlock new spells, increase your main or secondary attributes regardless of the attribute points to be distributed. The list of identifiers of the available talents allows you to see which talents you can reach. Talents do have a cost though, so make sure you have enough points to take them (you can also reset your talents using the "resettalents" command). To view a talent and see what it allows you to obtain, use the command "talentshow <idOfTalent>" and so continue the tutorial (the id of the talent is before the parenthesis in the list of available talents, except for the first one which is not in parenthesis).
tutorial.talentshow_first: In this display you can see what the talent gives you, as well as its cost. In the title of the display you have the information if you can take it or not. Use the hand emoji to take the talent or use the command "talentup <idOfTalent>" and thus continue the tutorial.
tutorial.talentup_first: Congratulations, if you had points your talent is now added! Please note that you can add your unlocked spells to your skill bar. The commands are the following: "buildshow", "buildadd", "buildmove". For more informations consult the help panel (command "help"). Now that you have grasped the basics of managing your character go fight other monsters, once you have obtained an item, use the command "inv" to display your inventory and continue this tutorial.
tutorial.inventory_first: Here is your inventory, you can filter it using some filters, use the command "help" to learn more about filters. In this display you have the list of items in your inventory. When you have an item, use the command "item" followed by its identifier, to display its informations and continue the tutorial.
tutorial.item_first: In this display you can see the statistics of the item, next to the attribute is an icon to know if it is higher or lower than your equipped item and in parenthesis is the difference with the equipped item. To equip an item and continue the tutorial, use the command "equip" followed by the item ID in your inventory, or use the emoji 🛡️.
tutorial.equip_first: By using this command you will equip the item if you meet the necessary conditions. This will unequip the equipped item. To see your equipped items and continue the tutorial, use the command "equiplist"
tutorial.equiplist_first: With this command you can see the most important informations about your equipment. Now that you've got the basics of combat down, let's get to travel! Use the command "region"
tutorial.region_first: This command allows you to see all the areas in your region. And also the regions which are connected to it. When you are strong enough, change the area where you are by using the command "travel" followed by the ID to the left of the area name. To travel from one region to another, use the command "travelregion".
tutorial.end: This is the end of the Fight RPG introduction tutorial! Thank you for following it! For more informations or help, join our support Discord: https://discord.gg/vhHJY8V.

inventory_equipment.nothing_in_this_slot: У вас нет никакого экипированного предмета в этом слоте
inventory_equipment.nothing_equipped: Вы не имеете никакого экипированного предмета
inventory_equipment.item_tag_as_favorite: Теперь этот предмет помечен как избранный (%s)
inventory_equipment.item_untag_as_favorite: Этот предмет больше не помечен как избранное (%s)
inventory_equipment.sellall_going_to_sell_all: Все предметы, не помеченные как избранные
inventory_equipment.sellall_going_to_sell_rarity: Все товары качества "%s", которые не отмечены как избранные
inventory_equipment.sellall_going_to_sell_type: Все элементы типа "%s", не помеченные как избранные
inventory_equipment.sellall_going_to_sell_level_sup: Все элементы, уровень которых больше или равен %d, не помеченные как фавориты
inventory_equipment.sellall_going_to_sell_level_inf: All items with their level lower than or equal to %d that are not marked as favorites
inventory_equipment.sellall_are_you_sure: Вы уверены, что хотите продать эти вещи?
inventory_equipment.sellall_going_to_sell_power_sup: Все предметы с мощностью больше или равной %d
inventory_equipment.sellall_going_to_sell_power_inf: Все предметы с мощностью ниже или равной %d
inventory_equipment.sellall_going_to_sell_subtype: All items of "%s" subtype that are not marked as favorites
inventory_equipment.sellall_going_to_sell_rebirth_sup: All items with their rebirth level greater than or equal to %d that are not marked as favorites
inventory_equipment.sellall_going_to_sell_rebirth_inf: All items with their rebirth level lower than or equal to %d that are not marked as favorites
inventory_equipment.item_tag_as_favorite_filtered: All items corresponding to the filter are now tagged as favorites
inventory_equipment.item_untag_as_favorite_filtered: All items corresponding to the filter are no longer tagged as favorites

mounts.reduction: Бонусы/пункты во времени путешествия для следующего климата/поезда:

trade.someone_proposed_you: %s invites you to make a trade
trade.you_accepted: You have accepted the trade request
trade.done: Trade finished, the items and/or money of the trade should be in your inventory
trade.notification_await_validation: The person with whom you are trading has validated the trade, awaiting your validation
trade.await_validation: Trade validated, waiting for the other person
trade.notification_add_item: %s added an item to the trade: "%s" [x%d]
trade.add_item: You have successfully added the item "%s" [x%d] to the trade
trade.notification_remove_item: %s removed an item to the trade: "%s" [x%d]
trade.remove_item: You have successfully removed the item "%s" [x%d] from the trade
trade.set_money: You have proposed %dG for this trade
trade.title: Trade between %s and %s

character.attribute_up_to: Характеристика %s увеличилась и теперь составляет %d пунктов
character.achievement_earned: Congratulations! Thanks to your accomplishments, you have unlocked the following achievement: "%s"
character.sure_to_reset_title: Are you sure to reset your attributes?
character.sure_to_reset_talents_title: Are you sure to reset your talents?
character.rebirth_do_you_want: What do you want to rebirth?
character.rebirth_sure_to: Do you really want to rebirth : %s?
character.rebirth_sure_to_description: All your items will be un-equipped, your stats, secondary stats, level and talents are going to be reset. You will move to the first area of the game. You won't lose anything else.
character.rebirth_sure_to_description_craft: Your crafting level will be reset. You won't lose anything else.
character.rebirht_items_loot: Items you loot will be at least rebirth level: %d.
character.rebirht_items_craft: Items you craft will be at max rebirth level: %d.
character.rebirth_items_stats: Items of rebirth level %d, will have %d% more stats compared to no rebirth level.
character.rebirth_monsters_stats: Monsters of rebirth level %d, will have %d% more stats compared to no rebirth level.
character.rebirth_stats_points_more: You will have %d points to distribute each level in stats.
character.rebirth_talents_points_more: You will start with %d more talents points to distribute.
character.rebirth_successful_level: Your strength diminishes, your field of view decreases and you faint. When you wake up, you realize that you are naked, right where your adventure began. However, you feel different, more powerful...
character.rebirth_successful_craft_level: After a long journey to become the best craftsman, you have found a master in this art, an old man. He has promised to help you, you follow him, he tells you that to become even better, you have to know how to start again. While you are having your tea, the old man quickly gives you a blow to the head. When you wake up, he's gone, but worse, you can't remember how you used to make your things. But you have the impression that you will do even better than your first time!

economic.sell_all_for_x: Вы продали все предметы в вашем инвентаре за %dG

admin.no_admin_xp_command: Вы не администратор, но вы пытались обмануть! К сожалению, Бог не добр и решил наказать вас; так вот вам совершенно новая жизнь. (Теперь вы 1 Уровня).

travel.travel_to_area: Вы путешествуете на территорию под названием: %s
travel.travel_to_area_exhaust: Вы устали, вам придется подождать %d секунд, прежде чем делать что-то снова
travel.wait_time_body_with_mount: %d секунд (Thanks to your mount you've gained %d seconds)
travel.total_without_weather: Total travel time without weather impact
travel.travel_cancel_easter_egg: You were about to head off, but got lazy and decided to stay. Maybe you're bipolar?

fight_pve.ganked_by_monster: Вы не были достаточно скрытными, монстр нападает на вас! (Вам нужно больше восприятия)
fight_pve.onfight_user_attack: %s атакует монстра %s и наносит **%d** очков урона
fight_pve.onfight_monster_attack: %s атакует игрока %s и наносит **%d** очков урона
fight_pve.level_up: Поздравляем! Вы выиграли: %d ур. Ваш уровень теперь: %d!
fight_pve.group_drop_item: Ваша группа выиграла несколько предметов! Поздравляем! (Rarest item found: %s)
fight_pve.group_level_up: Кто-то повысил свой уровень в вашей группе! Поздравляем!
fight_pve.group_both_gain: Ваша группа выиграла: %d Опыта и %d G

fight_pvp.honor_not_honorable: Сражаться не честно, вы проиграете: %d очков славы!

languages.list_of_languages: Список доступных языков (используйте ярлык для переключения языков)
languages.lang_changed: Язык успешно изменен, бот теперь будет отвечать на %s

lootboxes.open_message: Вы открыли ящик с добычей, вы получаете:
lootboxes.open_message_mult: Ты открыл %d коробок с награбленным, ты понял:
lootboxes.no_drop: Вы открыли ящик с добычей, но ничего не получили!
lootboxes.no_drop_mult: Ты открыл %d коробку с награбленным, но ничего не получил!

leaderboards.arena: Рейтинговая таблица PvP | Total honor among all players: %d
leaderboards.gold: Gold Leaderboard | Total gold among all players: %dG
leaderboards.wb_have_not_participate: You have not yet participated in a boss fight
leaderboards.power: Power Leaderboard | Total power among all players: %d
leaderboards.achievements: Achievements Leaderboard | Total achievement points among all players: %d

world_bosses.last_boss_never_fight: Ты еще не сражался в бою мирового босса.
world_bosses.boss_you_particpate_dead: The world boss "%s" you were fighting against is now dead.
world_bosses.boss_already_dead: This world boss is already dead
world_bosses.now_unmuted: World Bosses notifications are now activated
world_bosses.now_muted: World Bosses notifications are now deactivated

potions.reset_time: Вы чувствуете, что ваша усталость уходит, ваше время усталости было сброшено
potions.reduce_time: Ты чувствуешь себя бодрым, время усталости сократилось на порядок: %d%

vote_daily.you_voted: Вы проголосовали за бота, спасибо вам!
vote_daily.vote_no_week_end: В награду вы получите зелье против усталости!
vote_daily.vote_week_end: Бонус на выходные! Вы получаете два зелья против усталости!

help_panel.tutorial: Привет! Я вижу, что вы впервые используете FightRPG. Существует учебник по этой ссылке: %sСледуйте за ним, прежде чем что-либо делать, это поможет вам!
help_panel.inv_filter: Показывает инвентаризацию и фильтрует результаты. Фильтры - да: rarity,level,type,power,name
help_panel.item: Отображает информацию о выбранном предмете. Для использования оборудованных объектов: head, chest, legs, weapon или horse вместо ID.
help_panel.itemfav: Помечает предмет как избранное, чтобы предотвратить его продажу
help_panel.sellall_filter: Sells all items in your inventory that match your <filter>. Filters are: %s
help_panel.up: Добавляет к характеристике statName количество Очков
help_panel.leaderboard: Shows your ranking based on the argument (arena, gold, level, craftlevel, power)
help_panel.resettalents: Allows you to reset your talents
help_panel.grpfight: Позволяет вам попытаться атаковать выбранного монстра / монстров с вашей группой
help_panel.area: Показывает информацию о территории, в которой вы находитесь
help_panel.areaconquest: Показывает следующее Завоевание для этой территории
help_panel.arealevelup: Поднимает уровень территории, которой ваша гильдия обладают (вы должны быть на этой территории)
help_panel.areabonuseslist: Показывает список идентификаторов, связанных с бонусами территории
help_panel.arearesetbonuses: Refund all bonuses for current area
help_panel.traveldirect: Allows you to travel to one area, using it's real areaID
help_panel.guild: Показывает информацию о гильдии, в которой вы находитесь
help_panel.gapply: Позволяет подать заявку на вступление в гильдию
help_panel.gapplyremove: Позволяет удалить заявления по вашему выбору
help_panel.genroll: Регистрирует вашу гильдию для следующего Завоевания территории, в которой вы находитесь
help_panel.gunenroll: Отменяет регистрацию гильдии от следующего Завоевания этой территории
help_panel.gleaderswitch: Exchange your guild master position with another guild member
help_panel.grename: Change the name of your guild. When writing the guild name use "you new guild name" to take into account white spaces. Cost: %dG
help_panel.gterritories: Shows the territories held by your guild
help_panel.gkick: Kick the player from your guild
help_panel.grpinvite_mention: Приглашает игрока @упоминание присоединиться к вашей группе
help_panel.grpkick: Удаляет участника группы или отмена приглашения присоединиться к группе
help_panel.grpswap: Позволяет лидеру группы выбрать нового лидера группы
help_panel.mksearch: Search for the item that match filters. Filters are: %s
help_panel.mkshow: Показывает все товары на рынке на данной странице
help_panel.craftlist: Показывает все доступные рецепты в этом городе на данной странице
help_panel.sitems: Показать все доступные товары для покупки в этом городе на данной странице
help_panel.wbfight: Атакуйте мирового босса, если он есть в том районе, где вы находитесь.
help_panel.wblastinfo: Покажите вашу статистику по последнему боссу, которого вы убили.
help_panel.wbleaderboard: Displays the ranking of the best players in terms of either damage (damage) or attack counts (attacks) for the last World Boss in which you participated. The types are: damage,attacks
help_panel.titem: Shows the item <idInTrade> in the trade
help_panel.tadd: Add one or more item using <idItemInInventory> to the trade
help_panel.tremove: Remove one or more item from the trade
help_panel.tsetmoney: Set the amount of gold you want to trade
help_panel.tvalidate: Validates the trade. You must be in the same area as the person you are trading with. When you both validated, the trade is over. Everyone must re-validate the trade after changes were made
help_panel.talents: Displays information on unlocked and unlockable talents
help_panel.talentshow: Displays talent information with the <idTalent> identifier
help_panel.talentup: Unlocks the talent with the <idTalent> identifier
help_panel.skillshow: Displays the information of the skill with the identifier <idSkill>
help_panel.buildadd: Adds the skill with the <idSkill> identifier to your skill bar
help_panel.buildremove: Removes the skill with the <idSkill> identifier from your skill bar
help_panel.buildmove: Moves the skill with the <idSkill> identifier from your skill bar to the <slotNumber> slot
help_panel.buildclear: Removes all skills from your skill bar
help_panel.setmobile: Activate or deactivate the mobile friendly display mode. "Arg" could be: yes or no
help_panel.rebirth: Allows you to display your current rebirth bonuses, you can also react with the emojis to rebirth: level or craft level
help_panel.rebirth_level: Allows you to display the next rebirth bonuses for level, you will also have the possibility to rebirth your character level, a confirmation will be prompt
help_panel.rebirth_craft_level: Allows you to display the next rebirth bonuses for craft level, you will also have the possibility to rebirth your character craft level, a confirmation will be prompt
help_panel.event: Displays information about the event with the <idEvent> identifier
help_panel.appearance: Allows you to modify the appearance of your character
